name: deskthing-apps
description: A utility package for building all of the apps
author: Riprod

scripts.package: npm run build:compile && npm run start
scripts.webnowplaying: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && node webnowplaying-server.js
scripts.wnp: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && node webnowplaying-wnp-adapter.js
scripts.wnp-python: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && sleep 1 && source wnp_python_env/bin/activate && python3 webnowplaying-python-adapter.py
